We have created a new book page; yay!
Lilia was a made from the town of Chrystal.
This is page 2 of the book. This is a very long string of text however, so hello there!
Chrystal is a village of extreme wonder, \I[33] and it was treated as such by many. One had to be careful how they treated the villages there; it was certaintly not easy to get along.
